sentences.en: At the time, I was an apprentice electrician in a factory.
sentences.cn: 那时, 我还是一家工厂的电工学徒.

sentences.en: Bodeau's 1988 exchange guest, Nick Aldrich, an electrician from Lynnwood, Washington, agrees.
sentences.cn: 博杜1988年的交流客人尼克-奥尔德里奇(来自华盛顿州林伍德市的一位电工)表示赞同.

sentences.en: During a chat, Zheng said that he once worked an electrician.
sentences.cn: 在闲谈中, 郑某提到了他曾是一名电工.

sentences.en: Electrician: Applicants must have valid Alberta or Interprovincial Journeyman Electrician certification.
sentences.cn: 电工: 申请者必须拥有有效的阿尔伯塔省或跨省熟练工电工认证.

sentences.en: He is rated as a good electrician.
sentences.cn: 他被看作是优秀的电工.

sentences.en: I've heard an electrician got hurt when he hiked.
sentences.cn: 我听说有个电工在高空检修电线时摔伤了。

sentences.en: Maybe you should call an electrician.
Our washing machine has broken; I'll ring the electrician.
sentences.cn: 我们的洗衣机坏了, 我得给电工打电话.

sentences.en: She said she would find an electrician for us.
sentences.cn: 她说她要给我们找一个电工技师。

sentences.en: The electrician backed down carefully, while I held the ladder for him.
sentences.cn: 我扶住梯子,电工小心地退下来.

sentences.en: The electrician chiseled a hole in the wall to fit a door bell.
sentences.cn: 电工在墙上凿了个孔,以便装上门铃.

sentences.en: The electrician hooked up the doorbell.
The electrician joined the wires up.
sentences.cn: 电工把电线连接起来了.

sentences.en: The electrician refitted my old radio set.
sentences.cn: 电工将我的旧收音机加以改装。

sentences.en: The electrician strapped on many tools.
sentences.cn: 电工用皮带束住许多工具.

sentences.en: The electrician wound the wires off.
sentences.cn: 电工把电线从线卷上解下来.

sentences.en: The only electrician we could get hold of was miles away.
sentences.cn: 我们唯一能够联络到的电工离这里有好几英里远。

sentences.en: We need an electrician to fix our light switch.
sentences.cn: 我们需要一个电工来修理电灯开关。

sentences.en: We need an electrician to mend the iron.
sentences.cn: 我们要请电工修理熨斗.

words.tran_cn: 电的；电动的；发电的；导电的；令人震惊的
[物化] 电化学的；[物化] 电气化学的
使电气化；使充电；使触电；使激动

trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to connect or repair electrical wires or equipment
